title: OpenTable Restaurants Scraper
description: Scrape restaurant data from OpenTable. Provide a start URL or use search parameters to find restaurants.

start_url.title: Start URL
start_url.description: OpenTable search or collection URL to scrape restaurants from.

time.title: Time
time.description: Reservation time in HH:MM format (e.g., 19:00 for 7 PM).

covers.title: Party Size
covers.description: Number of people for the reservation.

location.title: Location
location.description: City or neighborhood to search for restaurants (e.g., 'Los Angeles', 'New York').

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of restaurants
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of restaurants to collect.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping.
